paramInformation.label: Restores state after power failure
paramInformation.description: The state before a power outage

paramInformation.label: Endpoint1 Count Down Configuration(Turn off the output by time)
Endpoint1 Count Down Configuration(Turn on the output by time)
:Endpoint2 Count Down Configuration(Turn off the output by time)
:Endpoint2 Count Down Configuration(Turn on the output by time)

options.label: LED indicator will display power consumption whenever the device is plugged in
LED indicator will display power consumption whenever the device is ON in and will turn off when the plug is OFF
LED indicator will display the level of power consumption for 5 seconds only whenever the device is turned on or off

metadata.inclusion:
ADD or Remove the MP31ZP from the existing Z-Wave™ home control network with your primary controller.
---Refer to your primary controller instructions to process the inclusion / exclusion setup procedure.
---When prompted by your primary controller, click the PROG button Three times in one second
---Include MP31ZP to/from a Z-Wave™ Gateway with supporting Security.The MP31ZP can support the Primary Controller that implemented the security S2.”
metadata.exclusion:
ADD or Remove the MP31ZP from the existing Z-Wave™ home control network with your primary controller.
---Refer to your primary controller instructions to process the inclusion / exclusion setup procedure.
---When prompted by your primary controller, click the PROG button Three times in one second
---Include MP31ZP to/from a Z-Wave™ Gateway with supporting Security.The MP31ZP can support the Primary Controller that implemented the security S2.
metadata.reset:
Press the button twice quickly and then press and hold the button 10S.device will reset
---(Node:Please use this procedure only when the network primary controller is missing or otherwise inoperable)

2.label: Basic set from Endpoint1
2.description: When the output of the MP31ZP Endpoint1 socket is changed, On (0xFF) or Off (0x00)orOverload, The MP31ZP will automatically send out a related basic set command. On (0xFF) or Off (0x00) to its associated group.

3.label: Basic set from Endpoint2
3.description: When the output of the MP31ZP Endpoint2 socket is changed, On (0xFF) or Off (0x00)orOverload, The MP31ZP will automatically send out a related basic set command. On (0xFF) or Off (0x00) to its associated group.
